short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best wallet for Bitcoin. Powered by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ORANGE WALLET - THE BEST DAMN BITCOIN WALLET ON THE PLANET.

Orange Wallet is the gateway to Bitcoin's decentralized future, catering to newcomers and seasoned crypto enthusiasts. Our wallet simplifies navigating the decentralized internet, allowing anyone, anywhere, to dive into the world of crypto. With Orange Wallet, users can explore everything from asset management to the use of innovative financial services with blockchain, all with just a few clicks.

KEY FEATURES
-  Decentralized:  Have full autonomy in your crypto journey with zero risk from any centralized control
-  Non-Custodial:  Keep full control of your funds with no risk of access from anyone
-  Intelligent:  Streamline your journey in crypto using artificial intelligence (AI)
-  Secure:  Enjoy a private, anonymous, and non-custodial experience that has been audited by Hacken and secured on the best blockchain in the world

KEY FUNCTIONS
-  Store:  Safely store Bitcoin and your favorite tokens on Ordinals, Stacks. and metaprotocols such as BRC20, Runes, etc.
-  Buy:  Safely purchase a variety of cryptocurrencies from reputable third-party partners such as Moonpay and Transak using cash
-  Swap:  Exchange assets cross-chain across different cryptocurrencies
-  Bridge:  Bridge between Bitcoin and EVM-compatible cryptocurrencies
-  Earn:  Earn loyalty rewards through the Orange Rewards program by holding $ORNJ tokens

MORE INFORMATION
-  Visit our website at https://orangecrypto.com
-  View our documentation at https://docs.orangecrypto.com
-  Speak to our team and community at @orangecryptoHQ on X, Telegram, and Discord
